Question
========

A pre- and post-measurement was done on five individuals:

  ------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- Before 14 12 20 18 18 After 18 17 28 21 23 ------ ---- ---- ---- ---- ----

The standard deviation of the differences is equal to:

Answerlist
----------

* 0.84
* 1.87
* 3.5
* 3.88

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.84: Incorrect
* 1.87: Correct
* 3.5: Incorrect
* 3.88: Incorrect
